name: AbstractHorseEntityHelper
description: The AbstractHorseEntityHelper class provides specialized access to horse-like entities in Minecraft, including horses, donkeys, mules, and llamas.
overview: This class offers comprehensive methods for monitoring and interacting with horse-specific behaviors such as taming status, equipment, statistics, and various states. It is particularly useful for creating scripts that manage horse companions, analyze horse stats for breeding purposes, coordinate mounted combat, or track the status of tameable horse-like entities in the world.

methods.name: getOwner
methods.description: Retrieves the UUID of the owner of the horse entity.

methods.name: isTame
methods.description: Checks if the horse entity is currently tamed.

methods.name: isAngry
methods.description: Checks if the horse is in an angry state.

methods.name: isSaddled
methods.description: Checks if the horse is equipped with a saddle. Note: This provides information but does not modify the state.

methods.name: canWearArmor
methods.description: Checks if this specific type of horse entity is capable of wearing armor.

methods.name: canBeSaddled
methods.description: Checks if the entity is capable of being equipped with a saddle.

methods.name: getInventorySize
methods.description: Gets the size of the horse's inventory. Varies by type (2 for horses, 3 for donkeys/mules, varying for llamas).

methods.name: isBred
methods.description: Checks if the horse was bred by players rather than spawned naturally.

methods.name: isEating
methods.description: Checks if the horse is currently eating grass. Does not detect when fed items by players.

methods.name: getJumpStrengthStat
methods.description: Gets the raw jump strength attribute value of the horse.

methods.name: getHorseJumpHeight
methods.description: Calculates the approximate jump height in blocks based on the jump strength attribute.

methods.name: getMaxJumpStrengthStat
methods.description: Gets the maximum possible jump strength attribute value for this entity type.

methods.name: getMinJumpStrengthStat
methods.description: Gets the minimum possible jump strength attribute value for this entity type.

methods.name: getSpeedStat
methods.description: Gets the raw speed attribute value of the horse.

methods.name: getHorseSpeed
methods.description: Returns the actual movement speed of the horse in blocks per second.

methods.name: getMaxSpeedStat
methods.description: Gets the maximum possible speed attribute value for this entity type.

methods.name: getMinSpeedStat
methods.description: Gets the minimum possible speed attribute value for this entity type.

methods.name: getHealthStat
methods.description: Gets the current health value of the horse.

methods.name: getMaxHealthStat
methods.description: Gets the maximum possible health value for this entity.

methods.name: getMinHealthStat
methods.description: Gets the minimum possible health value for this entity type.
